Performances (Amendment) Act, No. 26 of 1064, 2, Sention 6 ofthe Public Performances Ordinance,  temnéouy ag amende fo. 40 of 1961, is hereby further amended as fotiows:--: af cheve a (1) by the enombering of that sootion as sub-section (1) of that section; and (2) by the addition, immediately after sub-section (0) of that section, of the following new ‘sub-section :— “ (@) Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraph (18) of section 272 of the Municipal Councils Ordinance read with sub-section (1), or of any by-laws made thereunder for the regulation of * carnivals, no Municipal Council shall {sone a licence for the conduct of a carnival within the administrative limits of such Council, except with the concur- rence of the Inspector-General of Police.” ¢ J
